description:
Our next meetup will be in March. It's another virtual meetup. Join us on zoom at 7 pm. You'll get the link when you RSVP.

We're delighted to have a fantastic talk this month from Mike Rogers.

** Mike Rogers: Docker for Developer Happiness **

Docker allowed me to extract lots of my apps complexity by reducing the amount of dependencies I had to install. I want to share information about how to get up & going, with enough working knowledge to have fun :D

** Lightning Talk **

TBA

* * *

Slack

If you have any questions or suggestions please join us on Slack. Go to https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
title: South West Ruby #32 (ONLINE)
